title: KTR warns Army cantonment of water and power cut, BJP says TRS trying to remove military base from Hyderabad - Times Now
content:
1. KTR warns Army cantonment of water and power cut, BJP says TRS trying to remove military base from Hyderabad  Times Now
  2. Telangana minister KT Rama Rao warns military of snapping water and power supply  The Indian Express
  3. Telangana Govt Plans to Cut Power, Water Supply to Cantonment Areas in Hyderabad  News18
  4. Telangana minster KT Rama Rao warns of cutting power, water supplies to cantonment areas  Hindustan Times
  5. If needed, govt may disconnect power, water lines to Cantonment areas: K T Rama Rao  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: BJP has condemned the statement by Telangana Rashtra Samithi (TRS) leader KT Rama Rao (KTR) on the issue of power and water supply to the cantonment. “It is a really shocking comment from Telangana municipal minister KTR who is well educated. He doesn’t even have respect for our Indian army. This really shows the Telangana government’s stand on how they treat our Army,” the saffron party said.
